info.description: API for integrating, analyzing, and visualizing sports and health data
info.title: KUHA REST API

post.description: Authenticates the refresh token and returns a new JWT token
Authenticates the client_token and returns a JWT and refresh token

get.description: Returns a list of athletes for a given sector
Returns a list of nations for a given sector
Healthcheck endpoint

post.description: Insert multiple activity zone summaries for user (idempotent)

get.description: Returns a list of deleted users with timestamps
Get all exercises (HR_Zones, Samples, Sections) for a specific user

post.description: Insert multiple exercise bundles for user (idempotent)
Insert multiple measurements for user (idempotent)
Insert multiple questionnaire answers for users (idempotent)
Insert multiple symptoms for user (idempotent)
Insert multiple test results for users (idempotent)

get.description: Retrieve a single user by UUID

post.description: Upserts a user with the provided data

get.description: Returns all entries of a specific data type for a user, across all wearable devices, optionally filtered by date range.

200.description: List of data entries across devices

parameters.description: Number of hours to look back (1-8760)

200.description: List of tokens needing data update

delete.description: Disconnects a user's wearable device by deleting the associated token

post.description: Posts Garmin data for the specified user on the specified date

201.description: Created: Data successfully stored (no content in response body)

delete.summary: Delete all Garmin data for a user

204.description: No Content: No available dates found
